TEXT.BODY: Shr 75 cts vs 64 cts Net 11,174,000 vs 7,408,000 Sales 218.8 mln vs 106.3 mln NIne Mths Shr 1.80 dlrs vs 1.54 dlrs Net 23,762,000 vs 16,603,000 Sales 414.8 mln vs 295.9 mln NOTE: 1987 net income excludes preferred dividends of 2.4 mln dlrs in the quarter and 2.7 mln dlrs in the nine months compared with 188,000 dlrs and 563,000 dlrs in 1986.
